OB: Bug 45317DeltaManager always reports default timeout value for receiving session state on startup Hi there,If I override the state transfer timeout:<Manager className="org.apache.catalina.ha.session.DeltaManager"stateTransferTimeout="10"expireSessionsOnShutdown="false"notifyListenersOnReplication="true"/DeltaManager continues to log the default timeout value (ie: "This operation will timeout if no session state has been received within 60 seconds.
